trials.title: Phase 2 Trial Using Talampanel in Patients With Recurrent High Grade Gliomas

TALAMPANEL.interpretation: Phase 2 trial terminated without specified reason. No safety concerns mentioned. Candidate for repurposing.

RIVOCERANIB.interpretation: No glioblastoma trials found. Drug may have been dropped in other indications.

GENISTEIN.interpretation: No glioblastoma trials found. Drug may have been dropped in other indications.

EDOTECARIN.interpretation: No glioblastoma trials found. Drug may have been dropped in other indications.

trials.title: Cediranib Maleate With or Without Gefitinib in Treating Patients With Recurrent or Progressive Glioblastoma
trials.why_stopped: closed to recruitment early due to AstraZeneca not developing cediranib further

CEDIRANIB.interpretation: PRIME REPURPOSING CANDIDATE. Phase 2 trial stopped solely due to corporate decision to cease drug development. No safety or efficacy concerns. This is the gold standard for repurposing.

PERIFOSINE.interpretation: No glioblastoma trials found. Drug may have been dropped in other indications.

summary.key_finding: CEDIRANIB is a gold-standard repurposing candidate: terminated Phase 2 glioblastoma trial due to corporate decision (AstraZeneca ceased development), not safety or efficacy.
